member.name: D3D12_QUERY_HEAP_DESC
member.summary: Describes the purpose of a query heap. A query heap contains an array of individual queries.

member.name: D3D12_QUERY_HEAP_DESC.Count
member.summary: Specifies the number of queries the heap should contain.

member.name: D3D12_QUERY_HEAP_DESC.NodeMask
member.summary: For single GPU operation, set this to zero. If there are multiple GPU nodes, set a bit to identify the node (the device's physical adapter) to which the query heap applies. Each bit in the mask corresponds to a single node. Only 1 bit must be set. Refer to Multi-adapter systems.
